page.title: 10BAMFORD FOOTBALL CLUB.
page.content: BAMFORD FOOTBALL CLUB WAS FOUNDED IN 1907. MR.POWELL.JOINED THE FOOTBALL CLUB IN 1982 AS A PLAYER AND COMMITTEE MEMBER.MR. POWELL BECAME SECRETARY IN 1983.THERE ARE 34 PLAYERS AND TWO TEAM PLAYERS MUST LIVE IN BAMFORD OR HAVE MARRIED BAMFORD GIRLS, OR USED TO LIVE IN BAMFORD.THE FOOTBALL TEAMS ALWAYS PLAY ON SATURDAY.THE TWO MOST EXCITING GAMES WERE BAMFORD V PEAKDALE THE SCORE WAS 3-1 TO BAMFORD THEY PLAYED AT PEAKDALE AND BAMFORD V DUKE WILLIAM. THE SCORE WAS 3-2 TO BAMFORD THEY PLAYED AT BAMFORD. THE MOST TALENTED PLAYER IS ANTONY OLLERENSHAW AND HE PLAYS CENTRE. THE 1ST TEAM CAME 4TH IN THE LEAGUE AND REACHED THE SEMI-FINAL IN THE LAWRENCE CUP. THE 2ND TEAM CAME 6TH IN THE LEAGUE AND REACHED THE SEMI-FINAL OF THE RODEN CUP.THE GOALKEEPER IS D.FELL WHO PLAYED AT WEMBLEY.
